@GhostNapalm I disliked how Mariko (older sister) completely turned into a slut by fucking the group of teens on the beach. It’s like she wasn’t herself anymore. But it doesn’t come out as a surprise since Takishi destroyed her sense of moral completely. If there was a translation, maybe I would understand the situation better? But anyways, Yui (younger sister) giving Takishi maybe her virginity is already hinting at a complete harem NTR ending at this point. In one of the panels, Yui completely lost it in which it seems she’s in total ecstasy. I’m doubtless of a good vanilla ending since Takishi knows how to pleasure the women. Mariko was already craving his dicc after their first sex session. How do you expect Yui to even survive the first maybe two panels? Lol. Lastly, looking at the last panel, even though I can’t read Japanese, just by looking at it, Mariko lost her purpose. What’s that? Protecting her brother. Now, she fucks Takishi just for pleasure. Yui’s next unfortunately...

Hello everyone. A customer has paid us to translate this doujinshi. We estimate it will take approximately 2 weeks to complete. We will keep everyone updated on this comment section as we are aware that many people are excited to read the latest instalment of Fuetakishi's work.

If anyone else is also interested in getting a doujinshi translated from Japanese to English, please do not hesitate to contact us at HappyCoffeeStudios@hotmail.com. We offer competitive prices and professional customer service alongside. 

Enjoy!

I got the ending either being depressing as hell or branching into something else. We already know this is the same universe as the yankee stories (Given we saw the bullies in ch.1) so even if this does to south for little brother, he could possibly end up with his own thing, granted that 1 student whos friends with Yui did say she wish she had a brother like him. But thats thinking too far and deep, we may not even see the end until the end of next year, granted it was around this time last year that the first 2 chapters first released

@GhostNapalm I can’t read Japanese nor translate it on Google Translate but heck I didn’t know that was chapter 5’a cover art. Thought it was chapter 4. But yeah, the kid (brother) lost his mother and Takashi fucks (literally) his life up by stealing the two closest people in his life. His two older sisters. He’s gonna end up with nothing which is pretty sad. NTR is good, if you give both sides (brother and Takashi) a good ending. Honestly this whole series is just lazy writing if the younger sister didn’t agree to fuck Takashi in the first place. She could’ve found another way by ‘comforting’ (you know what I mean) the little brother instead. (Well, if I wrote the story) But hey I’m not complaining since NTR is hot and I love Fuetakishi’s style. I bet this series ends at chapter 6 with a threesome with the little brother watching. Rip.

Yea Yuis DONE. From the pictures on Twitter, she fell even easier than the older sister to the point that she was cliche unconscious from the D on the final page (if you saw the censored gallery).  Chapter 4s done but we wont see it until December and hes already partway done chapter 5s cover art, which features  Yui presenting herself willingly, the total opposite of 4s cover. Im not gonna lie, as much as I love Fuetakishis style, im starting to feel bad for the kid brother lol. Lost his mom and slowly losing his sisters to a friend he never truly had. Shit sucks but, we really need the rest of Elven High translated.
